title: Alternatives to Sauna Roman
content:
Hello!

I am looking for suitable alternatives to Sauna Roman.  
Qualities i like about Sauna: soft, friendly, only a hint of serifs, legible at smaller sizes

Btw, the font will be used in an all caps setting.

Thanks in advance!

Seb
author: all about seb

comments.content: I highly recommend Sauna, but one alternative is Thirstype's [Oz](http://web.archive.org/web/20120730183915/http:/www.vllg.com/Thirstype/Oz/mudTyper+Weights/).

David,

Thank you for the suggestion. Oz is another lovely alternative.

Btw, the problem with Sauna is that it is only available as a package and i only need a single weight...

Please keep the suggestions coming.

Some other fonts inspired by Oz Cooper:

[Fritz](http://web.archive.org/web/20120730183915/http:/fontbureau.com/fonts/Fritz)

[Miandra](http://web.archive.org/web/20120730183915/http:/galapagosdesign.com/original/maiand.htm)

[Robusto](http://web.archive.org/web/20120730183915/http:/galapagosdesign.com/original/robusto.htm)

I think you will like Tubby and Type by Tomi Haarparanta/

Mikey
A new font with a similar feeling is [Dancer](http://web.archive.org/web/20120730183915/http:/www.fontpartners.com/FPDancer.pdf) from Fontpartners.

Your welcome!

My best to you,

Mikey
